name: Star Crossed (itch)
description:
StarCrossed is an abstract, minimalist narrative game that takes place at a point in the universe where the universe is nearly dark. You play as one of the last remaining dwarf stars unsure of what you'll find among the debris.

This game was created in under 12 hours as part of Chill Jam 2016 in Edinburgh. There is no main menu, there is no end game. Spoilers are not included in the screenshots section.
